ComicInfo.Penciller: Aron Wiesenfeld,Dave Johnson,Travis Charest,Aron Wiesenfeld,Dave Johnson,Travis Charest
ComicInfo.Summary: The original team - Spartan, Zealot, Marlowe, Void, Voodoo, Maul, and Warblade - return from their trip to Khera, and they are forever changed. Can the WildC.A.T.s survive as a team after the revelation that the war with the alien Daemonites has been over for centuries. Plus, a bomb puts Max Cash in the hospital. The first shots of a super hero/villain war have been fired! Zealot, Spartan, Lord Emp, Void, Voodoo, Warblade and Maul are on their spacecraft back to Earth, pondering what their life will be like when they return. Meanwhile, on Earth, Savant's team of WildC.A.T.s are dealing with the crime war called upon them by a collective of super-villains. After battling some Zombots, Condition Red and Ladytron go to a bar with a superhero clientèle. Soon Condition Red views a man enter the bathroom with a briefcase and leave. A bomb explodes, destroying the bar, and giving Condition Red a concussion. Ladytron informs the rest of her team of the situation and, since some members of Stormwatch were also in the bar at the time of the explosion, they hold a meeting with Stormwatch on how to fight this crime war. In the middle of their meeting, the original WildC.A.T.s arrive at their headquarters.
ComicInfo.Title: Cataclysm
